articles.author: Analysis By Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Donald Trump made the Roseanne story all about him
articles.description: There were a few different ways President Donald Trump could have gone with his response to the firing of Roseanne Barr by ABC after the comedian made a racist comment about former Obama administration official Valerie Jarrett.

articles.title: Tom Arnold: We have a white trash President - CNN Video
articles.description: Tom Arnold, actor and ex-husband of Roseanne Barr, speaks out on President Trump's reaction to the cancellation of sitcom "Roseanne."

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: White House: 'No one's defending' Roseanne, but Trump still owed apology
articles.description: The White House insisted on Wednesday it was not defending Roseanne Barr for the racist tweet that ultimately led to her sitcom's cancellation on ABC.

articles.author: Brian Stelter
articles.title: Trump breaks silence on Roseanne Barr scandal
articles.description: President Trump's first public reaction to the cancellation of "Roseanne" is a shot at Disney CEO Bob Iger.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: The big thing everyone is missing in the Roseanne garbage fire
articles.description: Amid the furor caused by Roseanne Barr's racist tweet about former Obama administration official Valerie Jarrett, the role of one high-profile political player seems to be being ignored. That player's name? Donald Trump Jr.

articles.title: Lawmaker slams 'ramblings of a narcissist' - CNN Video
articles.description: Rep. Kathleen Rice (D-NY) criticizes President Trump for his tweet in response to the cancellation of "Roseanne," saying he missed an opportunity to lead on the issue of racism in America.

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová
articles.title: Roseanne Barr has more to say
articles.description: Roseanne Barr unleashed a stream of messages in the early hours of Wednesday after ABC canceled "Roseanne" over her racist tweet.

articles.author: Joseph Holt
articles.title: ABC gets it, but Roseanne and Trump do not
articles.description: Joseph Holt writes that neither Roseanne Barr nor President Trump seemed to get the real message of the show cancellation this week. Rather than continuing to condemn the racism at the heart of her original tweet, Barr pivoted from her apology to blaming Ambien, and then retweeted claims that she had been treated unfairly by ABC. Trump meanwhile also reached deep into his sense of self-pity to blame Disney CEO Bob Iger for not apologizing to him for an ESPN staffer's comments.

articles.author: Laura Jarrett, CNN
articles.title: Andrew McCabe turned over his memo on Comey's firing to Robert Mueller
articles.description: Former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe has turned over a memo he drafted related to the firing of his former boss, FBI Director James Comey, to the special counsel's office, according to a source familiar with the matter.

articles.author: Clare Foran, CNN
articles.title: Avenatti alleges Michael Cohen recorded 'inappropriate' conversations
articles.description: Michael Avenatti, the lawyer representing adult film actress Stormy Daniels, alleged in an interview with CNN's Jake Tapper on Wednesday that Michael Cohen, President Donald Trump's longtime personal attorney, had recorded "inappropriate" conversations.
